snippet.title: Expansion 2: The Siege of Paris Launch Trailer | Assassin’s Creed Valhalla
snippet.description:
In this second expansion, sail to the war-torn Kingdom of Francia and besiege the fortified City of Paris! Fight the merciless forces of Charles the Fat to safeguard your clan’s future.

Continue your Viking saga with The Siege of Paris: 
• Infiltrate the fortified walls of 9th Century Paris
• Aid the resistance against the Carolingian Empire
• Explore the lush Frankish countryside and sail the iconic Seine River
• Assassinate key enemies in open-ended quests 

Available from 12th August with the Season Pass or as Standalone.

Assassin's Creed Valhalla is now available on Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, PlayStation®4 system, PlayStation®5, Epic Games, Ubisoft Connect & Stadia. 

Get it now at https://www.assassinscreed.com/buy. 

Follow Assassin’s Creed: 
WEBSITE: https://www.assassinscreed.com 
FACEBOOK: 
https://www.facebook.com/assassinscreed 
TWITTER: https://www.twitter.com/assassinscreed
